Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Northbound Reroute near Woodlawn/55th
ShortDescription: NB 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/55th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 57th, Cottage Grove and Hyde Park, due to street blockage near Woodlawn/55th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains running w/residual delays following earlier unauthorized person on tracks at Harlem (Forest Park Branch). Service resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier unauthorized person on tracks near Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
